spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent adherence to the complex floor plan layout. Wall alignment and room adjacency are largely preserved. Minor discrepancies noted in the width of the pantry/laundry corridor and the garage secondary door placement.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms from the 2D plan are present. No text or UI elements are visible. The garage has been interpreted to include a second vehicle not shown in the 2D primary bay, though the space allows for it.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture accurately follows the block-style layout of the 2D plan, including the specific L-shaped sofas in the Theatre and Activity rooms, and the island bench in the kitchen.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfectly follows style constraints: low-poly geometry, flat shading, isometric orthographic camera, and a dark neutral background with no textures.

detected_errors.description: Hallucination of a second vehicle in the garage whereas 2D plan depicts a single large vehicle with specific clearance.
The Alfresco area sliding door spans a smaller width than indicated on the 2D plan.
